explains: v. 扼死，勒死，绞死；抑制，扼杀；抑制，压制（冲动，行动，声音）

sentences.en: He tried to strangle a border policeman and steal his gun.
sentences.cn: 他试图扼死一位边防警察并偷走他的枪。

sentences.en: The dead man got up and cried, "Now will I strangle you."
sentences.cn: 那死人站起来叫道：“现在我要把你掐死。”

sentences.en: In at least one case, it tried to strangle its owner.
sentences.cn: 在至少一例病患中，那只手试图勒死主人。
